name: Crane Top Fill Ultrasonic Cool Mist Humidifier for Bedroom and Large Rooms, 1.2 Gallon Essential Oil Diffuser with Nightlight and Auto Shut-Off
short_description: TRANQUILITY: Experience tranquility in your living space with our bedroom humidifier, designed to maintain optimal humidity levels in large indoor spaces up to 500 square feet. As one of the top air humidifiers for bedroom use, it's essential for your well-being and comfort, alleviating dry skin, chapped lips, and other dry-weather conditions.

AROMATHERAPY: Dive into the calming world of aromatherapy with our diffuser feature, allowing you to add your favorite essential oils and transform your space into a tranquil haven. This feature elevates the Crane Ultrasonic Humidifier from a simple humidifier to a comprehensive wellness tool, enhancing your overall well-being.

HEALTH BENEFITS: Harvest the health benefits of our room humidifier to help alleviate cold and flu symptoms. This room humidifier for bedroom use is a proactive step towards maintaining your health and wellness, improving your indoor air quality.

PEACEFUL SLUMBER: Sail into a peaceful slumber with our large humidifier, featuring a color-changing nightlight designed to create a calming ambiance in your room. This large room humidifier also includes an automatic shut-off safety feature, ensuring peace of mind and a restful night's sleep.

DIVERSE COLLECTION: Explore Crane's diverse collection of humidifiers for home use, available in a variety of colors to match your decor. Whether you're in need of large room humidifiers for home or office use, Crane offers a variety of options to enhance your indoor environment and improve your quality of life.

product_description: Warm and cool mist ultrasonic humidifier disperse warm and cool mist throughout your living spaces to create a soothing atmosphere at home with the LEVOIT Hybrid Ultrasonic Humidifier. Got a cold or the flu? The warm, soothing mist helps you relieve from cold,flu,and mineral dust around your living spaces. If you have trouble sleeping at night, the cool mist will alleviate congestion or a cough by keeping your throat and nasal passages hydrated. Moisturize your skin and reduce static electricity in your home with the cool mist function. Technical Specifications: Voltage: AC 120V / 60Hz Rated Power: 280W Water Tank Capacity: 6L (1. 59 gals) Max Cool Moisture Capacity: 300ml/h Max Warm Moisture Capacity: 500ml/h Running Time: 50 hours Package Included: 1 x Hybrid Ultrasonic Humidifier 1 x Remote Control 1 x Cleaning Brush 3 x Aroma Pads (1 pre-installed) 3 x Absorption Pads (1 pre-installed) 1 x User Manual Note: Use distilled water or filtered water instead of tap water, use tap water might leave white dust and grow mold. DO NOT put the humidifier on the wooden floor or wooden furniture directly unless a towel is placed on the wooden surface. Use caution when setting the warm mist function, the mist being diffused is hot. Clean once a week to prevent buildups and extend product lifetime. The minimum amount of water needed for the humidifier to function is 2cups (480ml). It is recommended to place the humidifier on elevated-level surfaces such as desktops, tables, or nightstands.

name: Cool Mist Humidifiers for Bedroom - 2.2L Water Tank, Baby, Office, Quiet Ultrasonic Air Vaporizer, Adjustable Mist Level, 360 Nozzle Rotation, Auto-Shut Off, Large Area Humidifier Easy Fill and Clean
short_description: Dryness Relief-Increase the moisture in your rooms, bringing the humidity to a level of optimal comfort for better sleep, easier breath, and relief of throat, skin, and lip dryness.
Adjustable Moisture-Control the humidity level with the easy-to-use dial so the mist released in the room is tailored to your preference. Turn the nozzle to control the direction of the mist output.
Silent Operation-The humidifier operates in silence—no hissing or beeping—quietly humidifying the air in your baby room, master’s bedroom, or living room while allowing you to sleep or relax.
Automatic Shutoff-The machine shuts off automatically when the tank is empty so you don’t have to worry about checking the water level or leaving the house while the humidifier is working.
Effortless Refill-The tank holds 2.2L of water—sufficient for 24 hours of constant use. A red light illuminates when it’s time to refill, the wide mouth ensuring this is quick and easy.
